name: Closure (itch) (CloudchaserKite, Grabbagofbones, Kumusta)
description:
Closure follows the journey of Alyssa as she recovers first-hand memories of why her childhood orphanage was set aflame. Warning, there are very dark themes in this game. Specific warnings are at the bottom of the page to prevent accidental spoilers. This is a demo of the full game.

Created for the horror summer slow jam hosted by Portland Indie Game Squad.  This game has a 10-15 minutes play time.

Controls:
WASD to walk in directions
Left-Click to interact
SHIFT to run
F1 for full screen
1, 2, and 3 select the corresponding inventory slots on Alyssa's person. Left-Click after to use selected item on the Environment.

Credits:
code and music: cloudchaserkite
items: Encifer
art: GrabBagofBones
ui: Kumusta
Made with Game Maker
